FuncDef:
The outbound recording-scheme command configures an outbound recording scheme in which the remote login operations of the device that functions as the client are recorded.
The undo outbound recording-scheme command cancels the configuration.
By default, the remote login operations of the device that functions as the client are not recorded.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a recording scheme.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters. The value should not contain slash (\), anti-slash (/), colon (:), asterisk (*), question mask (?), quotation mask ("), or angle brackets (< >).

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To record the remote login operations of the device that functions as the client, run the outbound recording-scheme command. The that is specified in the outbound recording-scheme command must have been created.
Prerequisites
The recording-scheme command has been run to configure a recording scheme.
